meanings.definition: A person who does menial tasks or work.
meanings.sent1: The dogsbody at the office is responsible for cleaning and organizing.
meanings.sent2: The new intern was assigned as the dogsbody to handle all the paperwork.
meanings.sent3: The dogsbody always has a mountain of tasks to complete, but they tackle them with determination.
meanings.sent4: In the busy kitchen, the head chef was like a conductor, orchestrating the chaos while the dogsbody handled the small details.
meanings.sent5: The dogsbody's role may seem unglamorous, but it is essential for the smooth running of the team.

meanings.definition: To work hard or diligently at a task.
meanings.sent1: She dogsbodies through her assignments, never stopping until they are perfect.
meanings.sent2: The team dogsbodies together to meet the project deadline.
meanings.sent3: Even though it was late, he dogsbodied through the night to finish the report.
meanings.sent4: The athlete dogsbodies through the tough training sessions to improve their performance.
meanings.sent5: With determination and focus, she dogsbodies through each challenge that comes her way.
